content: x5 repeat from * until 3 sts remain ch10 slip_stitch in top of previous treble_crochet treble_crochet x3 ch1 and turn row 25 double_crochet in each st across making sure the chain loops are sitting on the right side change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 26 treble_crochet x3 *ch10 slip_stitch in top of previous treble_crochet treble_crochet x5 repeat from * until 3 sts remain ch10 slip_stitch in top of previous treble_crochet treble_crochet x3 ch1 and turn row 27 double_crochet in each st across making sure the chain loops are sitting on the right side change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 28 treble_crochet x3 *ch10 slip_stitch in top of previous treble_crochet treble_crochet x5 repeat from * until 3 sts remain ch10 slip_stitch in top of previous treble_crochet treble_crochet x3 ch1 and turn ©2020 lyndas craft room & the wee house of crochet for the crochet sanctuary this pattern should not be copied sold or posted online without permission you may sell finished items as long as credit is given to the designers row 29 double_crochet in each st across making sure the chain loops are sitting on the right side change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 30 treble_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn now we are going to connect our loops you can use a crochet hook or your fingers it s your choice working from the bottom up take the first and second loops and pull the second loop through the first take the third loop and pull that through the second finally take the fourth loop and pull it through the third we will secure the fourth loop and complete the braid in the next row row 31 double_crochet x2 *double_crochet in the next st catching the last loop of your braid double_crochet in the next st and catch the loop again double_crochet x3 repeat from * until 2 sts remain double_crochet x2 change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 32 treble_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 33 double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 34 double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 35 double_crochet in each st across change colour in last yo of row ch1 and turn row 36 half_double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 37 treble_crochet x3 *skip st treble_crochet working back over the treble_crochet treble_crochet in the skipped st repeat from * until 3 sts remain treble_crochet x3 ch1 and turn row 38 half_double_crochet in each st across ch1 and turn row 39 treble_crochet x3 *skip st treble_crochet working back over the treble_crochet treble_crochet in the skipped st repeat from * until 3 sts remain treble_crochet x3 ch1 and turn ©2020 lyndas craft room & the wee house of crochet for the crochet sanctuary this pattern should not be copied sold or posted online without permission you may sell finished items as long as credit
